Giddeon the Believer was a mage philosopher and the creator of the enchanted kinetic spear, who lived sometime in the late 10 and early 11 century DR.
Giddeon was a renowned researcher and philosopher of the natural arcane magic currents who developed a theory that stated that the world had natural "currents" of magical energy, and one could tap into these "currents." According to Giddeons teachings, once a wizard could understand the "currents," they could use the flow of energy and draw from it via certain spells or focus devices. It was believed that Giddeon the Believer perished in a massive laboratory explosion of the , with only several items surviving. His kinetic spear was one of these items, created to tap into the worlds natural magic currents and channel them into explosive force.
